Compass
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Compass installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Compass, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Compass/2024.04-foss-2021b
```
